title: Produce Flame
content:
ight in a 9m radius and deals 1~8 Fire damage damage when thrown. Throwing the flame immediately after you conjure it does not cost an action. Extinguishing or throwing it on subsequent turns costs an action. Level: Cantrip School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Requires Concentration: No
